query: 如图,在▱ABCD中,∠ABC的平分线与对角线AC交于点E,与CD交于点M,已知BC=2,DM=3,▱ABCD的面积为28,则△ABE的面积为()选项：['\\frac{28}{3}', '\\frac{21}{2}', '10', '\\frac{14}{3}']
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,▱ABCD的面积为28,∴AD=BC=2,AB∥CD,AB=CD,△ABC的面积=\frac{1}{2}×28=14,∴∠ABM=∠CMB,∵∠ABC的平分线为BM,∴∠ABM=∠CBM,∴∠CMB=∠CBM,∴MC=BC=2,∴AB=CD=MC+DM=5,∵AB∥CD,∴△ABE∽△CME,∴\frac{AE}{CE}=\frac{AB}{CM}=\frac{5}{2},∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupABE}}{S_{\bigtriangleupCBE}}=\frac{5}{2},∴△ABE的面积=\frac{5}{7}×14=10；故选:C．
